mapper.select: select * from news where title is null or link is null or description is null or pub_date is null or image is null and card_type = 0 order by reg_date desc limit 0, 1 ;

select n.news_no, pr.name as publisher, pr.favicon, n.title, n.link, n.description, n.pub_date, n.image, n.author, n.card_type from news n join publisher_rss pr on pr.publisher_rss_no = n.publisher_rss_no where n.title is not null and n.link is not null and n.description is not null and n.pub_date is not null and n.image is not null and n.card_type = 1 or n.card_type = 2 order by n.reg_date desc limit #{offset}, #{limit} ;
mapper.insert: insert or ignore into news ( publisher_rss_no, title, link, description, pub_date, image, author, card_type ) values ( #{publisherRssNo}, #{title}, #{link}, #{description}, #{pubDate}, #{image}, #{author}, #{cardType} );
mapper.update: update news set title = #{title}, link = #{link}, description = #{description}, image = #{image}, pub_date = #{pubDate}, author = #{author}, reg_date = #{regDate} where news_no = #{newsNo} ;
